thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com | 2 of 522
thread.title: HAMID

author: HAMID
title: HAMID
text: Customer service was excellent. Prices are decent. Delivery was fast! The only issue was this so-called "Processing Fee" that you are not aware of until you are ready to checkout. It can add a lot to the price of the lens. I was able to work that out being the first time customer. If you compare prices, you must take into account the processing fee as it could be misleading. I suggest more transparency..!
